name: Motor Marque Ltd.
overview:
Motor Marque is your local garage that is based out of North Leeds at an easy to find location. Motor Marque offers wide-ranging services to its precious customers at its state-of-the art premises. All these services are intended to make the care and maintenance of your car or motor vehicle absolutely hassle-free and simple.

Having earned a firm standing for our high quality services in Chapel Allerton, we moved to larger premises just off the West Park ring road, to cater to your needs in a better manner. Since the inception, our objective has been to pay attention to our customers, comprehend their needs, and shape a business around what holds importance for them.

The services that are offered here reflect this process, be it the facility of courtesy cars, the time assigned to describe the work performed on your vehicle, or just a mini-valet that returns your vehicle to you fresh, sparkling and all set to drive.

Motor Marque is an independent company without any shareholders. Our entire staff goes through extensive training and has to work for a long time under proper supervision before all the staff members get prepared for handling independent roles.

We endeavor to deliver our clients with a dynamic, genuine and transparent service. By proffering vital advice and assistance, we keep our customers moving!
